Posts.Content: Gee wrote: I am experiencing major hair loss. I am 3 months post Mx/DIEP and started losing mass quantities of hair in the past two weeks. I have been trying to read up about it and heard that it could happen after a major surgery. It is called Telogen effluvium. Lucky I have thick hair and only a few people have mentioned anything. Can anyone tell if they have experienced the same thing and what their outcome was. Gee Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hair Loss Gee CrunchyPoodleMama
